catalog.name: 1/20 degree regional simulation of the Eastern Tropical Pacific Ocean Cold Tongue

dataset.name: 1/20 degree regional simulation of the Eastern Tropical Pacific Ocean Cold Tongue

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - 1/20 degree regional simulation of the Eastern Tropical Pacific Ocean Cold Tongue(d583118)

metadata.documentation: This dataset includes subsets of hourly and daily averaged model output data from a 1/20 degree regional model simulation of the eastern tropical Pacific ocean. The daily averages cover most of the simulation domain while the hourly file includes the hourly data along 4 longitudinal lines. The archive also includes the model setup files and scripts necessary to rerun the model.
